issue.title: [Release] Post merge script for release should not be necessary with the new workflow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16667](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16667). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In discussion with Krisztián we think that post-01-merge.sh is not required as we should be using archery cherry-pick on the maintenance branch instead of creating branches and cherry picking manually for patch releases.
